reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Facilitating Chinese cities' sustainable development by developing a guideline for China's urban regeneration planning

description.narrative: The project is designed to introduce and incorporate UK concepts of regeneration into China's Ecological Restoration and Urban Regeneration Initiative, by its Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development, facilitating the development of more sustainable regeneration methodologies in Chinese cities. This is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
